rows.label: tlk41700122_02_msg0001
rows.name:
The water tower is completely
broken, isn't it...

rows.label: tlk41700122_02_msg0002
rows.name:
Thankfully, it seems we can manage
by drawing water from Coolley Lake,
but...

rows.label: tlk41700122_02_msg0003
rows.name:
There's a contaminated pond nearby, so
I'm a little worried about the negative effect
it might have on our crops.

rows.label: tlk41700122_02_msg0004
rows.name:
And for that matter, what's the point of having the
Empire's strongest Driver if she's useless when
it really counts?

rows.label: tlk41700122_02_msg0005
rows.name:
I really want the Superbian army to catch
the culprits who broke the water tower, no matter what.
